title: Drawing, "Garden of Mr. and Mrs. Robert McKay, Georgetown, Washington, D.C.", 1951
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and black and gray wash, white gouache on white wove illustration board.
markings: Stamps: on verso: Jessie Ayers/ 326 West 25th St./ N.Y. 10. N.Y. MU5-6048; copy- right stamp
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on verso: 1/2 flat black/glass; in red crayon: H 4866/4/51/121 l9l9-1-1/Combo Facson/ 120[---] Inscribed in graphite on verso: 1/2 flat black/glass; in red crayon, verso:H 4866/ 4 51/ 121/ 1919-1-1/ Combo Facson/ 120 [---] 2.75 l295
description: View of a narrow garden (22' x 74') with 3 brick-paved circular planting areas. Trees and garden furniture are indicated.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Garden of Mr. and Mrs. Robert McKay, Georgetown, Washington, D.C.", 1951. Pen and black ink, brush and black and gray wash, white gouache on white wove illustration board.. 1986-15-1.
